title: Hybrid Diagnostics
shortDescription: Advanced hybrid system scans and ECU diagnostics.
fullDescription: Our hybrid diagnostics service uses manufacturer-grade diagnostic tools to scan hybrid control modules, ECUs, inverters, battery management systems, and regenerative braking components. We identify fault codes, performance inconsistencies, sensor failures, and communication errors between hybrid subsystems. This service is essential for early detection of hybrid issues, ensuring optimal performance, safety, and fuel efficiency.

title: Battery Health Check
fullDescription: Hybrid batteries degrade over time due to heat, charge cycles, and cell imbalance. Our battery health check evaluates voltage balance, internal resistance, cooling efficiency, and overall capacity. We detect weak cells early, helping extend battery lifespan and prevent sudden hybrid failure.

title: Engine & Transmission
shortDescription: Engine servicing and hybrid transmission inspection.
fullDescription: Hybrid engines and transmissions operate differently from conventional vehicles. We service Atkinson-cycle engines, inspect CVT and e-CVT systems, and ensure smooth integration between electric motors and internal combustion components. This service improves reliability, smooth acceleration, and fuel efficiency.

title: Brake & Suspension
fullDescription: Hybrid vehicles rely heavily on regenerative braking, which reduces wear but introduces complex electronic control. We inspect brake actuators, pads, discs, suspension joints, and shock absorbers to ensure safety, comfort, and consistent braking response.

title: Software Updates
shortDescription: Hybrid ECU software updates and calibration.
fullDescription: Manufacturers release software updates to improve efficiency, fix bugs, and enhance hybrid performance. We safely update hybrid ECUs, recalibrate systems, and reset learned parameters to ensure smooth operation and improved fuel economy.

title: General Maintenance
fullDescription: We provide complete general maintenance tailored for hybrid vehicles, including air conditioning servicing, tire services, wheel alignment, cooling system checks, and preventive inspections. Regular maintenance ensures longevity, reliability, and lower operating costs.
